seo.title: David Castrillón · Full-stack Developer (Frontend-focused)
seo.description: Full-stack developer focused on Frontend, specialized in React and TypeScript. I build fast, accessible, and maintainable interfaces. 8+ years across fintech and e‑commerce.

home.name: David Castrillón Gonzales
home.main_paragraph: Full-stack developer specialized in frontend with React and TypeScript. I design and build fast, accessible, and maintainable user interfaces.
home.second_paragraph: Also experienced with Go, Node.js, and Java and test automation using Selenium and Appium, enabling end-to-end collaboration.

about.title: About me
about.first_paragraph: I am passionate about programming and continuous learning. I believe knowledge should be shared, and I enjoy learning with others and teaching what I learn.
about.second_paragraph: I work well in teams, embrace challenges, and remain calm when making decisions to find effective solutions.
about.third_paragraph: Committed to improving software quality and delivering real value to customers.
